title: Biocenter Restaurant Vegetaria
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Buffet, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Spanish
description: Veggie restaurant. Daytime features a salad bar buffet and a menu of the day. Some organic offered. Night time features a la carte ordering of assorted specials from menu. Large space, casual atmosphere. Smoking allowed in front of restaurant.
